title: Pell equations 4: the positive solution group is infinite cyclic

blocks.name: pellfund14
blocks.content: Every positive Pell solution is a power of the fundamental solution. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  oveq2(s0, (⌊ `((log ` c1)[÷](log `(PellFund ` c0)))), (PellFund ` c0), cexp)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (PellFund ` c0), cexp, (⌊ `((log ` c1)[÷](log `(PellFund ` c0)))))
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfl, ((log ` c1)[÷](log `(PellFund ` c0))))
  diff.cfl.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (log ` c1), cdiv, (log `(PellFund ` c0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clog, c1)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clog, (PellFund ` c0))
  diff.clog.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpellfund, c0)
  diff.cpellfund.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pellfund14b
blocks.content: The positive Pell solutions are precisely the integer powers of the fundamental solution. To get the general solution set (which we will not be using), throw in a copy of Z/2Z. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pellfund14b(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0)))))
  pellfund14(s0, c0, c1)
  r19.29an(s0, cz, wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wcel(co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0)), cfv(cpell14qr, c0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0)), cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cfv(cpell14qr, c0)))
  sseldd(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cfv(cpell14qr, c0), cfv(cpell1qr, c0), wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)))
  pell1qrss14(c0)
  pellfundex(c0)
  simplr(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0))))
  pell14qrexpcl(c0, cfv(cpellfund, c0), cv(s0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0))), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wcel(co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0)), cfv(cpell14qr, c0))))
  eleq1(c1, co(cfv(cpellfund, c0), cexp, cv(s0)), cfv(cpell14qr, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cn, csquarenn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.csquarenn.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpell14qr, c0)
  diff.cpell14qr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pellfund14b(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)→(c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbida(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0), ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0)))
  pellfund14(s0, c0, c1)
  r19.29an(s0, cz, c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0))
  mpbird(((c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ s0 ∈ ℤ)∧ c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0)), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0), ((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0)∈(Pell14QR ` c0))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ s0 ∈ ℤ)∧ c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0)), ((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0)∈(Pell14QR ` c0), c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), (PellFund ` c0)∈(Pell14QR ` c0), s0 ∈ ℤ)
  simpll(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), s0 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0))
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), s0 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0), (PellFund ` c0)∈(Pell14QR ` c0))
  sseldd((PellFund ` c0), (Pell14QR ` c0), (Pell1QR ` c0), c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN))
  pell1qrss14(c0)
  pellfundex(c0)
  simplr(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), s0 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0))
  pell14qrexpcl(c0, (PellFund ` c0), s0)
  adantl((c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ s0 ∈ ℤ), c1 =((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0), (c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)↔((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0)∈(Pell14QR ` c0)))
  eleq1(c1, ((PellFund ` c0)[^]s0), (Pell14QR ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (ℕ \[]NN))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cn, csquarenn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.csquarenn.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, (Pell14QR ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpell14qr, c0)
  diff.cpell14qr.s(s0)
}
